attributes.title: Could not be more proud 🥳
attributes.review: When I opened this magnificent app I was greeted by the smiling face of OUR president, Mr. Trump. It was hard to contain my excitement. I finally had more content to add to my Trump shrine! However, after I got the app, I constantly had leftists trying to ”save” me. I’m worried they’ve gone too far and hacked my mind now. First my phone, then my life. If this review is rated one star instead of five, they got to me. 😡

attributes.title: Do not get!!
attributes.review: I dont know what happened to the real Trump app, but it seems as this one is a fake app. As soon as i opened the app after hours of it downloading, i was asked to type my number in and a couple minutes pass and i start getting telemarketing calls from what seems china. Do not get unless you want the Chinese stealing your information!!!

attributes.title: Downloading this app will make you regret all your life choices
attributes.review:
DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!! JUST DONT DO IT!!!! 

Not only will this app have your phone and delete everything but it allows the government to access all your information that you think is private. Why would you allow the government to have that power over you? 

Just save yourself some trouble and don’t download this app!

attributes.title: AWFUL
attributes.review: this app ruined my life. 😾😤 I had the absolute WORST experience ever while using this app, not only did it hack my phone but it also shut down my phone completely and forced me into restarting my phone all together. THANKS TRUMP you will NOT have my vote 2020 all because of this app. In fact I was not planning on voting anyways and this app was just the cherry on top. Thanks for ruining my life. 😻🥰😆😤🤪🤙🏼😺❤️

attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY HATE IT !!!!
attributes.review: To start off it took like 8 weeks to download, and once I opened it it told me that I had to put all of my information in. Once I did that, the app pinned my location and I got a knock on my door seconds later. It was Donald trump himself coming to kill me. I didn’t go down without a fight, but alas trump himself used my only weakness: small hands. I would not waste my time on that Cheeto puff of a man.

attributes.title: Worst. App. Ever.
attributes.review: App took way too long to download. Once downloaded, I opened it and it immediately crashed. So after a few minutes I got a message saying “Vote Donald J. Trump President 2020 or we’ll send you back to you $h¡t hole country and enslave you.” Not wanting to go back to Nicaragua and face slavery and oppression, I have no choice but to vote trump 2020. If I come back to the US I’ll be put in the internment camps they call ICE detention centers😔

attributes.title: What the heckity doo dah?
attributes.review: What the heckity doo day, Mr. President? You see, I got this here app to look at your campaign but it just won’t stop crashing!!! It also wiped all my pictures and videos of my dear kids and grand babies!!! It also kept asking me after one article to donate $50 to see more! You say you’re for the common man so why the steep price sir? This just will not do. I’d like to speak with the apps manager at ONCE

attributes.title: Very bad 🤬🤢😾😾😾
attributes.review:
Don’t download this app, paranormal things started happening to me after I downloaded this app. My dog started to tell me some very profound and “curse like” things, luckily I got the chance to write it down before he stopped talking.  Here it is:
every 🤩 time ⏰ i🧴find 🧚🏼‍♀️it 🐖 my 🥀 defenses 🥊 scream 🗣 oh ✨ no ❌ you 💝 don’t 🌚 ʷᵒᵃʰ 😳 
As you can see this is pretty serious.
10/10 do not recommend

attributes.title: I WISH I could give 1 star...
attributes.review: This is the worst app I’ve downloaded on my phone EVER. I’ve never seen my phone act up so crazy until after I downloaded this app. Also the download took up all the WiFi in my house so I couldn’t see our racist, homophobic, sexist (etc.) president of ours tweet any fun little tweets:((( so upset:((( I will not vote to re-elect just because of the quality of this app. Shame.

attributes.title: The words are jumbled
attributes.review: This app is by far the most terrible app ever created. If I could give it negative stars I would. Takes forever load and when it does it’s almost like the words don’t quite form properly. It’s also very bland, no pop of color to catch your attention. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP. If you have to pay someone to NOT download it then do that, no matter the price.
